alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:02PM EDT until July 29 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNTERDON...MERCER...SOUTHERN SOMERSET...CENTRAL MONMOUTH...MIDDLESEX AND SOUTHEASTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 701 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edison to near Jamesburg to near Washington Crossing, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Somerset, Edison, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Marlboro, Manalapan, Ewing, Holmdel, Princeton, Manville, Matawan, Jamesburg, Hightstown and Cranbury. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8 and 11. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 60 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 10 and 11. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 113 and 128. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
